plot: Cold Stone Jug is based on Herman Charles Bosman's prison experience in Pretoria Central, when he was sentenced to death for murder.
title: Cold Stone Jug
plot_es: Cold Stone Jug is based on Herman Charles Bosman's prison experience in Pretoria Central, when he was sentenced to death for murder.
plot_en: Cold Stone Jug is based on Herman Charles Bosman's prison experience in Pretoria Central, when he was sentenced to death for murder.
